DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety prasugrel ticagrelor patient ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction undergo primary percutaneous coronary intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Prasugrel Ticagrelor ST-segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: Prasugrel ticagrelor recommend patient ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) undergo primary percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . Both prasugrel ticagrelor show rapid potent antiplatelet effect compare clopidogrel . However , previous report compare efficacy safety prasugrel ticagrelor patient STEMI East Asian ethnicity lacking . Therefore , aim study compare antiplatelet efficacy safety use laboratory platelet function test clinical outcome patient STEMI treat either prasugrel ticagrelor .
DOC.criteria: Patients STsegment elevation myocardial infarction Undergoing primary percutaneous coronary intervention Aged 20 80 year Previous administration antagonist platelet adenosine diphosphate ( ADP ) P2Y12 receptor ( clopidogrel , prasugrel ticagrelor ) History stroke transient ischemic attack Previous gastrointestinal bleeding within 6 month , bleed diathesis , platelet count < 100,000/mm3 hemoglobin < 10 g/dl Chronic oral anticoagulation treatment Contraindication antiplatelet treatment Severe renal insufficiency ( serum creatine > 2.5 mg/dl ) Severe hepatic dysfunction ( serum liver enzyme bilirubin > 3 time normal limit ) Sever chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) bradycardia Body weight < 50 kg
